class.name: ScriptEditorBase
class.brief_description: Base editor for editing scripts in the [ScriptEditor].
class.description: Base editor for editing scripts in the [ScriptEditor], this does not include documentation items.

method.name: add_syntax_highlighter
method.description: Adds a [EditorSyntaxHighlighter] to the open script.

method.name: get_base_editor
method.description: Returns the underlying [Control] used for editing scripts. This can be either [CodeEdit] (for text scripts) or [GraphEdit] (for visual scripts).

signal.name: edited_script_changed
signal.description: Emitted after script validation. For visual scripts on modification.

signal.name: go_to_help
signal.description: Emitted when the user requests a specific documentation page.

signal.name: name_changed
signal.description: Emitted after script validation or when the edited resource has changed. Not used by visual scripts.

signal.name: replace_in_files_requested
signal.description: Emitted when the user request to find and replace text in the file system. Not used by visual scripts.

signal.name: request_help
signal.description: Emitted when the user requests contextual help.

signal.name: request_open_script_at_line
signal.description: Emitted when the user requests a script.

signal.name: request_save_history
signal.description: Emitted when the user contextual goto and the item is in the same script.

signal.name: search_in_files_requested
signal.description: Emitted when the user request to search text in the file system. Not used by visual scripts.
